xccj,"2011-09-12T18:17:16.407Z","Better Than A Spinner Pack","

If you're into the Ninjago theme, then you're probably aware of the spinner packs that contain a figure, a spinner, and some weapons and cards.
column2: Well, Mountain Shrine is like a spinner pack, but better.&nbsp

column1: First off, this set has a ton of great pieces.
column2: Overall, it has 169 plus a few extras.&nbsp
column3: It comes with Kai DX, who comes with some gold dragon printing on his uniform.&nbsp
column4: It also comes with a classic skeleton in tan that's supposed to act as a testing dummy.&nbsp
column5: There are also lots of weapons
column6: the new firesword, a scythe, a chain, spinning blades, torches, and more.&nbsp
column7: It also has some other rare elements, like the green flags, gold tiles,&nbsp
column9: In addition to the Lego elements, 5 cards are included for the Ninjago card game.&nbsp
column10: Overall, it has everything that a regular spinner pack contains, plus a ton of extra pieces.&nbsp
column11: But while the basic spinner packs are $9.99, this set is only twice as expensive at $19.99.&nbsp
column12: This alone makes it a much better deal... but wait there's more to say!

column1: The design of the temple is something to marvel at.
column2: I think it's a fabulous design, especially for a cheaper set.&nbsp
column3: It uses a few pieces effectively and really gives off the oriental feel.&nbsp
column4: I especially like the ornamental scorpions on the top of the tower.&nbsp
column5: The triangular shape of the temple also comes out nicely, and the angles work towards the realism.

column1: The set has some decent playability, but I wouldn't say that it's the best part of the set.
column2: The main focus is using Kai's spinner to knock down the skeleton dummy, and he can test out the various weapons as he trains.&nbsp
column3: The spinning blade portion of the set also works nicely, although it's certainly not a highlight.&nbsp
column4: The role playing aspect of the set would be improved if there was another ninja included to train with Kai, but as it is he'll just have to use the skeleton dummy as company.

column1: Overall, I think this is a great set, and certainly one of the better cheaper sets.
column2: The shrine managed to pull of a good oriental look, and it includes the weapons and spinner that represent the playability of the Ninjago theme.&nbsp
column3: Plus, it's as good as the spinner packs, but contains far more pieces at a much better price.&nbsp
column4:
If you're looking for a good Ninjago set, I would easily recomend this set.

",TRUE,5,5,5,4,5

LegoMunchy88,"2011-07-26T16:46:20.53Z","Great Way to Get the Sword....","

I really think this set is great. Lego 2254 Mountain Shrine is a small set and a great way to get the fire sword. It's either this of the highly overpriced Fire Fortress ($130). Although there is am downside: playability. You'll see why I still gave it a generous 3 for playability later....
column3: Kai DX: Obviously a great figure with some great weapons and a nice spinner. Not as good as te original ninjas, though. I compared Flying Ninja Fortress to Garmadon's Dark Fortress, and Flying Ninja Fortress will always remain my favorite set.
column4: Dummy Thing: I really love this guy. With some very uncommon skeleton bone pieces, and the overall look of it, it's great. And I was estatic to find that after being so bored of the new ""poseable"" skeleton bodies, they had brough the old body with the flailing arms back. Yay!
column6: This set, as I stated before, is really great. I'm going to start with the main structure. I love how the torjii gate looks so great on top and how the pieces come to a point at the front. It's some really neat architecture. And a really good selection of weapons. You get the scythe, two torches, some kind of nunchuck thing, and the awesome Fire Sword. There is one thing I dont like, though: the little side thing on the 4x4. It's just pointless, It's one more thing for Kai's spinner to crash into when he's trying to knock over the dummy. Also, has anyone else noticed that when you go the hit the blade contraption, the only thing that happens is the the center spins around from being poorly attached? Maybe it's supposed to add to the set, but I just don't like it. I mean, I think everybody who has bought this set so far would have still bought it if it didn't have that little ugy 4x4.
column8: Overall, LEGO 2254 Mountain Shrine is a great way to get some awesome stuff for a small amount of money. And now, what everyone's been waiting for. Why, you ask, did I give this set a very generous 3 for playability? Because come on, people, you can spend 10 dollars more on a spinner pack for a guy to go with it. Is that really going to make that much of a dent in everyone's piggy bank? I bought the Sensei Wu (Black Robes) pack with the set, and it works great. Sensei Wu can come to test Kai by engaging him in a Ninjago battle. Overall, a really good set, and I like old LEGO, so this is saying a lot for me. One of the best thing's LEGO made in a long time, I think.

Blazing_Brick,"2012-04-14T14:07:20.25Z","One of the best deals on the spinners","

This set is a spinner set,yet also a normal set.It was surprising to finally see it come out,because there already 2 DX ninjas released as spinners.It really counts as a training set,as that's what it's for.But it doesn't really help.Yeah,it gives you 3 unique weapons,powerful cards,a cool spinner,a cool minifig,but the rest is just to give the set better value.And the rest of the set did its job.

Kai DX is not exactly a new minifig,but the sword of fire is a new part.There's a holder for the sword at the top of the shrine made out of scorpions.There were good cards,too.Total Recall is a gold card with 400 Fire SP,and it concerns swapping weapons.Weapon Force makes you combine your weapons.Gold Rush isn't helpful at all.Reckless only on skeleton opponents and is the only Earth card include in this set.The other weapons were good:A Double Headed Scythe,and a very large whip-like weapon.The spinner is golden with the Fire Emblem displayed on the side edges,with flames behind it and around it.

The Shrine has holders for all the weapons,and there's grass and rocks everywhere.This set is really good,and others say it's worth the money more than any other set.Personally,I think Garmadon is a better buy,but this is second to best!
